tweet: Yo Dog, I heard you like smart contracts? So we put smart contract in your smart contracts on a blockchain  https://t.co/7lN3F25NSq Cardano CL's first testnet has been released

First Cardano smart contracts testnet launches today, the KEVM testnet. This is the first time that a complete formal semantics of the EVM have been produced and important first in cryptocurrency that is a step towards building 3rd generation blockchains:   https://t.co/J046BJH6RA  https://t.co/orSENWP89d
Also the update proposal for Cardano 1.2 should be shipping fairly soon. Expect receiving it sometime tomorrow (an update request takes 12 hours to propagate throughout the network)

With the launch of the first #Cardano testnet for smart contracts, Duncan Coutts, IOHK Director of Engineering, introduces this release and explains the further testnets that will be released.  https://t.co/ayhVukkWbm #smartcontracts #blockchain @cardanocom @CardanoStiftung

IOHK is pleased to announce the release of the KEVM testnet. This is the first smart contracts testnet for Cardano. Read more details here on the @cardanocom forum:    https://t.co/XASLGpaxng #Cardano #blockchain #smartcontracts  https://t.co/XwtyajmQRN
We launched first Cardano smart contracts testnet!! #EMURGO #IOHK #Cardano #ADA  https://t.co/bZ55ZGoyxS
